title: INtopBackup
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Photos: Scenes from the 150th Westminster Dog Show
items.description: Hundreds of dogs competed for the top prize at the Westminster Kennel Club Dog Show this week. Penny the Doberman pinscher was named best in show.

items.title: Greetings from Kyiv, where candles are the last option during wartime blackouts

items.title: Fears of new arms race as US-Russia nuclear weapons treaty due to expire
items.description: The New Start treaty has limited the number of deployed strategic nuclear warheads for both countries.

items.title: Ukrainians remain defiant as Russia targets infrastructure during winter
items.description: Ukrainians are reeling from a frigid winter but remain defiant as Russia continues to target infrastructure. CBS News' Aidan Stretch has more.

items.title: Leader of South Africa's second largest party to step down

items.title: No suspect identified in disappearance of Savannah Guthrie's mom
items.description: The disappearance of "Today" show co-host Savannah Guthrie's mother, Nancy Guthrie, is being investigated as a crime.
